oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Love Never Dies at the DPAC
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Durham Performing Arts Center (Durham, N.C.); Woodcuts (prints); Lloyd Webber, Andrew, 1948-; Split Fountain Printing;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Three color window card (pink and silver on split fountain, black to light blue) announcing Andrew Lloyd Webber's Love Never Dies at the Durham Performing Arts Center on October 31 - November 5. Poster features a woodcut of a mask.
